DOC.brief_summary: Delta Pulse Pressure and Delta Down have been validated in surgery upon closed chest. This study aim to evaluate the influence of sternotomy on the value of Delta Pulse Pressure and Delta Down.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Delta Pulse Pressure and Delta Down Before and After Sternotomy
DOC.criteria: All patients scheduled for open chest surgery. Age < 18 years Patients with arrhythmia
